liquibase.change.MergeColumnChange

liquibase.change.MergeColumnChange Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for liquibase.change.MergeColumnChange:
[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Combines data from two existing columns into a new column and drops the original columns.

Definition at line 19 of file MergeColumnChange.java.

Returns:

Exceptions:
